channel.title: [HELP] How do I verify my server? I don't understand! [HELP]
channel.description:
Hi. I have been adding my server ever once a while.. and tried verifying them right on each of the times. NOTE: I do wait until 24 hours to see If It has been added before I do it again atleast. I don't get what it means when it tells me to log in with that username and password on the ip address it gives me..
Can anyone help me with this? Many thanks If you can, and If you do have a solution please post it in full detail as possible, thanks! :D

item.title: [HELP] How do I verify my server? I don't understand! [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

this meas"your server wont be verified untill you log in on your server with the username and password that they give you.so basically create the account with the funnny looking username and password that they give you… on your server so they can log onto your server with it to see if your servers online.SO basically what your doing is making them the account so they can log into it.hope i helped

Read full topic
